description:
Pong Chain is a distributed game ecosystem based on blockchain technology architecture. With a decentralized structure, it directly links the entire game eco-chain to achieve direct docking, non-destructive circulation and secure storage of individual values.
Throughout the Pong Chain ecosystem, game developers and players around the world are able to convert their value into their own revenues and circulate in the ecology in the form of PONG (Pong Chain Pass), the official commercial value. Transfer the media. Used for empowerment, reward settlement, transaction records, business operations, and other scenarios.
name: Pong Chain
